          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">A Crossword  - Work and School</string>
            <string language="en">A Crossword - Work and School</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Kreuzworträtsel - Arbeit und Schule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des mots croisé - travail et école</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um crossword - trabalho e escola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lle parole incrociate - lavoro e scuola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σταυρόλεξο - εργασία και σχολείο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un crucigrama - trabajo y escuela</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Solve the crossword! All the words have been used in this module.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 6 - What Would You Like?</string>
            <string language="en">Solve the crossword! All the words have been used in this module. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 6 - What Would You Like?</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lösen Sie das Kreuzworträtsel! Alle 
Wörter sind in diesem Modul verwendet worden. Safir - Englisch 
und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 6 - was wurden Sie mögen?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Résolvez les mots croisé ! Tous les mots 
ont été utilisés dans ce module. Safir - l'anglais et vie 
active pour des débutants - module 6 - que aimez-vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Resolva o crossword! Todas as palavras foram
usadas neste módulo. Safir - vida do inglês e de funcionamento
para novatos - módulo 6 - que  você gosta?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risolva le parole incrociate! Tutte le 
parole sono state usate in questo modulo. Safir - inglese e vita
attiva per i principianti - modulo 6 - che cosa gradite?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λύστε το σταυρόλεξο! Όλες οι λέξεις έχουν 
χρησιμοποιηθεί σε αυτήν την ενότητα. Safir - αγγλική και
οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 6 - τι θα 
θέλατε;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Solucione el crucigrama! Todas las palabras
se han utilizado en este módulo. ¿Safir - inglés y vida 
laboral para los principiantes - módulo 6 - qué  usted tiene gusto?</string>
          </description>
